ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Light Sources
ygData.msgSnippet:
If you go to East Commons and kill the Willowisps they drop a lightstone or
greater lightstone as well as a little coin. Don t put it in a backpack
leave it in
ygData.messageBody:
If you go to East Commons and kill the Willowisps they drop a lightstone or greater lightstone as well as a little coin. Don't put it in a backpack leave it in one of your inventory slots and it will improve your vision. I've had one on my beastlord now since level 4 and it hasn't burned out yet. Oh and the greater lightstones sell for about 6pp depending on your charisma
 
Flaumigahexe
Quellious
-------Original Message-------
 
From: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Date: Sunday, December 07, 2003 9:03:43 AM
To: EverQuest \(E-mail\)
Subject: [EverQuest] Light Sources
 
I have human paladin (level 6) and he suffers from the same problem the rest
of his race does.  He uses a 2 handed sword so I can't carry anything in my
hands.  I have the worn newbie candle in my pack for light.  I bought a
lantern but it did nothing in my pack.  I was looking in the bazaar and saw
lightstones, mechanical light emitters and various creature eyes.  Are any
of these a better light then my candle and can they be used from my pack?
When I look at the items it makes no mention of range or brightness.

Iksar monk 12
Wood Elf Ranger 12
Human Paladin 6
"just trying all the options to see what I like."
